item.title: CMSC320: Introduction to Data Science
item.description: Course Information CMSC320: Introduction to Data Science Spring 2018 Instructor: Héctor Corrada Bravo Center for Bioinformatics and Computational Biology Department of Computer Science hcorrada@umiacs.umd.edu Office: 3114F Biomolecular Sciences Building Lecture Meeting Times Tuesday and Thursday 3:30-4:45pm HJ Patterson 0226 Links Check the calendar page for up-to-date course calendar. Check the logistics page for more information, including the official syllabus. Grades and assignments posted in ELMS.
